title: Find Negative Of A Number
f-sharp:
let negativeOfNumber num : int =
  num

let result =  negativeOfNumber 5

printfn "Negative of given number : -%d" result
ruby:
print "Enter a number : "
num = gets.chomp.to_i
num =num*-1
print "Negative : #{num}"
swift:
import Swift
import Foundation

var n = 5
var negativeN = -1 * 5
print("negative of 5 : ", negativeN)
description:
## Write a program to find negative of a number

```txt
Input  : 5
Output : -5
```

---
go:
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	var num int
	fmt.Scanf("%d", &num)
	ans := num * (-1)
	fmt.Println(ans)
}
php:
<?php

declare(strict_types=1);
printf("Input a number: ");
$fin = fopen("php://stdin", "r");
$line = fgets($fin);
printf("Output: %d\n", -intval($line));
